Headline: #126 Jackson Temporary Reroute at Jackson/Keeler
ShortDescription: 126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Jackson, Pulaski, Madison, Kostner, & Jackson due to, street blockage near Jackson/Keeler.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Jackson, Pulaski, Madison, Kostner, & Jackson, due to street blockage near Jackson/Keeler.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #24 Wentworth Temporary Southbound Reroute near Wentworth/28th
ShortDescription: SB 24 Wentworth buses are temporarily rerouted via Wentworth, 26th, State, 31st, & Wentworth, due to street blockage near Wentworth/28th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #24 Wentworth buses are temporarily rerouted via Wentworth, 26th, State, 31st, & Wentworth, due to street blockage near Wentworth/28th.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #156 LaSalle Temporary Reroute near LaSalle/Wacker
ShortDescription: 156 LaSalle buses temp. rerouted NB: LaSalle, Washington, State and Grand; SB LaSalle, Illinois and Madison: due to, street blockage near LaSalle/Wacker.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#156 LaSalle buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near LaSalle/Wacker due to street blockage near LaSalle/Wacker.

Northbound buses will operate via LaSalle, Washington, State and Grand including the normal route streets at the beginning and end.

Southbound buses will operate via LaSalle, Illinois and Madison.

Allow extra travel time.
